dcterms:creator: C. Cieri
D. Miller
K. Walker
dcterms:description: The dataset was collected for ASR by pairing Spanish speakers located in the US and Canada through phone calls. Although it is not a CS focused dataset, it contains a significant amount of CS utterances due to the speakers being in English-speaking contexts.
dcterms:title: Fisher

dcterms:creator: M. Deuchar
P. Davies
J. R. Herring
M. C. Parafita Couto
D. Carter
dcterms:description: The dataset contains recorded conversations between bilingual English/Spanish speakers in casual settings, with a high proportion of naturally occurring code-switched speech.
dcterms:title: Miami
